item.title: CS130-lecture-20201130
item.description: Exercise solns # Graph cont. # Gets shortest path because it starts by searching all edges that are 1 away, then 2 away, and so forth. Tracing the BFS implementation Enter the loop Path tree on right ^ Performance: Worst case runtime is O(E) or O(V+E) Worst case space complexity O(V), when every vertice is added to the queue There is a maximum of (V(V-1)) vertices in a digraph with no parallel or self-loops.
